definitions.definition: A company , business, organization, or other purposeful endeavor .
examples: The government sponsored enterprises (GSEs) are a group of financial services corporations which have been created by the United States Congress.
A micro- enterprise is defined as a company or business having 5 or fewer employees and a low seed capital.

definitions.definition: An undertaking , venture , or project , especially a daring and courageous one.
examples: Biosphere 2 was a scientific enterprise aimed at the exploration of the complex web of interactions within life systems.

definitions.definition: A willingness to undertake new or risky projects; energy and initiative.
examples: He has shown great enterprise throughout his early career.

definitions.definition: Active participation in projects. (Can we add an example for this sense?)

main_definition: A company , business, organization, or other purposeful endeavor .
secondary_definitions: An undertaking , venture , or project , especially a daring and courageous one.
( uncountable ) A willingness to undertake new or risky projects; energy and initiative.
( uncountable ) Active participation in projects. (Can we add an example for this sense?)
